sentence: royalty expense, which was recorded under cost of license and other revenue and cost of subscription revenue on autodesk’s consolidated statements of operations, was $17.4 million in fiscal 2016, $17.9 million in fiscal 2015, and $18.0 million in fiscal 2014.
